security_audit.summary: This is a documentation/help skill for the Context Tools MCP plugin. All 89 static findings are FALSE_POSITIVE. The skill contains only markdown documentation describing CLI tools and file paths. No actual code execution, network calls, or data exfiltration. File operations are scoped to the .claude/ directory within user projects.

content.user_title: Index code symbols for faster navigation
content.value_statement: This skill adds MCP tools for fast symbol search across Python, C++, and Rust codebases. It automatically indexes functions, classes, and methods into a local SQLite database, enabling quick lookups without full codebase scans.
actual_capabilities: Fast symbol search for functions, classes, and methods using pre-built SQLite index
Get all symbols defined in a specific file with one query
Retrieve exact source code for any symbol by name
Automatic background indexing with status monitoring tools
Project manifest generation showing structure and build commands
Duplicate code detection in repo map documentation
limitations: Only supports Python, C++, and Rust file symbol indexing
Symbol search requires explicit pattern matching, not natural language
Learnings file must be created manually if needed
Session restart required after plugin installation for MCP tools

Forgetting to restart the session after plugin installation, then wondering why tools are unavailable

faq.question: Which programming languages are supported for symbol indexing?
faq.answer: Python, C++, and Rust files are supported. The indexer extracts functions, classes, and methods.

faq.question: How does the dynamic directory support work?
faq.answer: MCP tools automatically adapt to the current working directory. Each project gets its own .claude/repo-map.db file.

faq.question: Is my code data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. All indexing and search happens locally on your machine. No data is transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why do I need to restart after installing?
faq.answer: MCP servers start when Claude Code launches. Plugin changes only take effect on the next session startup.

faq.question: What happens if indexing gets stuck?
faq.answer: The watchdog detects hung processes after 10 minutes and automatically resets status. Use reindex_repo_map to recover.

faq.question: How is this different from using Grep or Search tools?
faq.answer: Symbol search uses a pre-built SQLite index for faster lookups. Use symbol search for names, Grep for file content.
